author: ShawnMarie
title: My first lego set
review:
This was my very first lego set.  It went under my bed and came out when I didn't know what else to do.  As an only child legos were a great toy because unlike the board games I had I could do them all by myself.  My dad used to like to build with me too.

I loved the slanted roof pieces because they were much easier to put together than my Lincoln Logs.

Lego has come a long way but when these pieces turn up in our bin (I don't have the box any longer) I definitely know they were from that set.  They are still going strong.
